instructions.title: Instructions:
instructions.step1: If you haven't signed up for a FLIZ company account, please click here and sign up.
instructions.step2: Once you have signed up, please generate a new API Key in your FLIZ company account and paste it in the "API Key" field below. You will find the API Key in the "Installation" section of your company account.
instructions.step4: Wait about 5 seconds and the page will reload automatically.
instructions.step5: After the page reloaded, a green box will appear at the bottom, indicating the successful configuration of the FLIZpay plugin. You are now ready to receive fee-free payments.
instructions.step6Before: Assign FLIZpay to your sales channels and set the display order.
instructions.step6After: to configure availability and drag FLIZpay to the top of the list for maximum fee savings.
instructions.step7: Moreover, we advise you to activate cashback for your customers. With cashback, you change your customers' payment behavior to ensure they use fee-free payment method FLIZ. This way, customers support your bottom line and optimize their own finances at the same time. You can activate cashback in your FLIZ company account, click here.
